name: Uvaloop of Obsession
desc: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 Synchro Monster you control or in your GY; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Synchro Monster you control or in your GY; banish it, and if you do, add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Uvaloop of Obsession" once per turn.
str2: Add this card to the hand
